response.original_title: The Art of The Film Title
response.overview: Gjoko Muratovski interviews Dan Perri, an extraordinary Hollywood title designer and a protege of the legendary designer Saul Bass. In a career that spans for more than 50 years, Perri has designed the opening titles for iconic films such as Star Wars, The Exorcist, The Nightmare on Elm Street, Raging Bull, Wall Street, The Color of Money, Taxi Driver, The Warriors, Caddyshack, and many more. In this interview Perri highlights many behind the scenes stories and shares his experience of working with directors such as Martin Scorsese, Robert Altman, Oliver Stone, and others.
response.title: The Art of The Film Title
